Destination Graduation Classroom Advisor - Central High School
Valley of the Sun United Way

The Classroom Advisor Program facilitates learning activities and small group discussions while assisting high School students to become invested in their educational success.  Advisors go to Central High School every other week to work with the students. The Destination Graduation program is based on research, conducted by the Johns Hopkins Center for Social Organization of Schools and the Philadelphia Education Fund, showing that up to 75% of America‚Äôs high school dropouts can be identified between sixth and ninth grades by one or more indicators:-poor Attendance-poor Behavior-course failure in English or Math.These Early Warning Indicators allow the opportunity to identify and respond appropriately to students signaling they need extra support.
